name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-document-preview
title: React-Document Preview ListView Command Set
shortDescription: Shows the preview of the selected document from the list view in a panel
longDescription: This extension will create a command menu named '**_Smart View_**' to view the preview of the images, videos and documents in a side panel without navigating to a new page. Following are the file types supported. (More information on supported file types are available on Project ReadMe)

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
